# OpenClaw CRM

> The CRM your AI agent already knows how to use. Open-source, self-hosted, with native OpenClaw Bot integration.

## Overview

OpenClaw CRM is a free, open-source, self-hosted CRM built for AI-native workflows. It ships with a full REST API, machine-readable documentation, and first-class OpenClaw Bot integration so your AI agent can manage contacts, deals, tasks, and notes without any glue code.

- Website: https://openclaw-crm.402box.io
- Docs: https://openclaw-crm.402box.io/docs
- GitHub: https://github.com/giorgosn/openclaw-crm
- License: MIT

## What It Does

- **People & Companies**: manage contacts and organizations with 17 attribute types
- **Deals & Pipeline**: drag-and-drop Kanban boards with customizable stages
- **Tasks & Notes**: linked to any record with rich text editing and deadlines
- **Lists**: curated collections with list-specific custom attributes
- **Search**: full-text search across all records
- **Custom Objects**: create your own entity types beyond People, Companies, and Deals
- **AI Chat Agent**: talk to your CRM data in plain English via OpenRouter (Claude, GPT-4o, Llama, Gemini)
- **CSV Import/Export**: bulk data import with column mapping
- **Dark & Light Mode**: full theme support

## OpenClaw Bot Integration

Generate a SKILL.md and config from Settings > OpenClaw, drop them into your OpenClaw Bot's skills folder, and your agent can manage your CRM through natural language. 40+ API endpoints, bearer token auth, machine-readable docs.

## Tech Stack

Next.js 15 (App Router), TypeScript, PostgreSQL 16, Drizzle ORM, Better Auth, shadcn/ui, Tailwind CSS v4, TanStack Table, dnd-kit, TipTap, OpenRouter.

## API

Full REST API at `/api/v1/` with Bearer token authentication (`oc_sk_` prefix).

- Concise API reference: https://openclaw-crm.402box.io/llms-api.txt
- Full product + API docs: https://openclaw-crm.402box.io/llms-full.txt
- OpenAPI spec: https://openclaw-crm.402box.io/openapi.json

## Self-Hosting

Docker Compose deployment. Clone the repo, configure `.env`, run `docker compose up`. No vendor lock-in, no per-seat pricing, no data leaving your infrastructure.

Detailed setup: https://openclaw-crm.402box.io/docs
